mapper.sql: id, username, password, realname, role_id, usertype, state, third_id, end_time, email, tel, address, title_url, remark, theme, back_site_id, create_site_id, create_time, create_id, update_time, update_id
mapper.select: SELECT r.id as roleId,u.id,u.username,u.tel,u.email,u.remark,r.name AS roleName from sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r on r.id=u.role_id where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from sys_user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
